website_summaries.verdict: Never again be limited by just one time and temperature setting. This pot offers two settings for a more customizable slow cooker experience.
pros: Handles clip on tight to prevent spills
Display changes color when the food is done
Users love the dual settings and all of the different foods that can be made
cons: Some users feel the lid could fit tighter
Initial use can be confusing without carefully reading the manual

customer_reviews.title: Broke on 2nd Use
customer_reviews.text: Product appears to be high quality but on the second use on Thanksgiving day meal the pot cracked open and ruined the meal. Not sure if faulty ceramic but Main problem is I tried to contact Hamilton Beach and they won't even respond to my request for support. So disappointed in the after the sale support out of what use to be a quality brand company.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Horrible user interface ruins an otherwise acceptable design
customer_reviews.text: The LCD is difficult to read when setting the cook times and temperatures because the backlight is not on. Once the unit begins cooking the backlight comes on and the LCD display is very easy to read. The user interface design is idiotic because of the difficulty programming the cooking cycle. One programmed it works fine. It is just difficult to program because of the lack of a backlight.
customer_reviews.author: batray

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Slow Cooker
customer_reviews.text: This slow cooker does exactly what it is supposed to do. The basic settings are easy enough. The stoneware insert is easy to remove, and cleans up well. I would buy this product again. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Rymonster

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooker with awesome features!
customer_reviews.text: Large, accommodates any recipe I would ever make Love the programmable feature that allows you to set the cooker from one setting to the other for your designated time. So many excellent and well-designed features. Received as a gift and SO happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: pateacher

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, cooks as expected but seems as though when it switches to keep warm that the temperature is just a bit too high.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: The dual timer and temp setting is excellent. This is the best cooking device we’ve purchased in years and that includes a big green egg and a butterball electric fryer.
customer_reviews.author: MDMEC

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: This item is a total embarrassment to Hamilton Beach. Outside of unit is like aluminum foil. Dents to the touch. Thank you Chinese manufacturers.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hambone

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far it works good, I just have to get used to low actually being low.
customer_reviews.author: Cecily Glancy

customer_reviews.title: Good Slow Cooker
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a while and it works pretty good. I haven't had any issues with it. The cooker is a good size for making a large amount of food. I do not have any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use this weekly or even more. Cooking is a chore, so using the crock to make meals for the week is a plus. The item is nice to look at, so doesn't take away from the room, and easy to use. I'd recommend for anyone who is a lazy cooker like myself!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good slow cooker decent price.
customer_reviews.text: Decent slow cooker used it for beef stroganoff, potato soup, pork butt roast, spare ribs, and of course chicken noodle soup. Easy to clean fairly easy to program. My only complaint is the screen is pretty dim until it’s cooking so I have to get eye level with it and squint for my settings then it lights up once it’s going.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good Slow Cooker. Annoying to use settings
customer_reviews.text: It works very well, but the control panel is non-intuitive and I have to reread the lousy instructions every time I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Good Luck Charm

customer_reviews.title: hard to read display
customer_reviews.text: hard to read display, no backlight. have to use flashlight to see. otherwise does everything else as advertised. would have given five stars if had backlight.
customer_reviews.author: Brian G

customer_reviews.title: Good Slow Cooker
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this new Crock Pot once but I used it to roast a whole chicken. It came out perfectly, so moist and tender. I could have placed it under the broiler for a few minutes to brown the skin but I was removing the skin anyway so it didn't matter. I will definitely be roasting more chickens this way. The size of the cooker is just right for many things as well. I am glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Siegel

customer_reviews.title: Pass this one. It’s not good.
customer_reviews.text: With so many products to pick from, id suggest you pass on this one. It doesn’t heat up enough and takes too long to cook food. The interface is difficult to read and it’s just not of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: SW

customer_reviews.title: One of A Kind Functionality!
customer_reviews.text: Love this crockpot. It’s the only one out there with a dual cooking option where you can put on low for so many hours and then it goes to high for whatever hours programmed and then goes to warm. Or you can put it on high to low for programmed hours as well. Low to high or high to low!
customer_reviews.author: N. Massey

customer_reviews.title: No timer
customer_reviews.text: Because it is “programmable”, I thought that I would be able to set it on a timer to start while I’m out of the house. But that’s not the case - I still need to attach a timer or smart plug. So that was disappointing because it was the main reason I decided to replace my old crockpot.
customer_reviews.author: LornaP

customer_reviews.title: Been using this slow cooker weekly & it is great! Love being able to program it & have ...
customer_reviews.text: Been using this slow cooker weekly & it is great! Love being able to program it & have things ready when I get home from work.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Need better
customer_reviews.text: Needs better instructions for 1st time users was highly disappointed that the manufacturer thought people would know how to use out the box. Still havent understood the flex mood.. sooo but it works well so far no issuses.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: We have made soup, stew, and roasts in it and it works great. The meat is tender and moist. The seal on the lid keeps the moisture from dripping over the side. Seems you can cook almost anything in it. Tons of recipes on line.
customer_reviews.author: Roger A. Locy

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! It has 3 heat settings perfect for whatever you need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazingspunky

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: i bought this for my mom for Christmas and she loves it. i like how the handles lock and it is a bigger crock pot.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: was damaged
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift so wasn't opened until Christmas day, was dented so would like to return even though past the return time
customer_reviews.author: Sissy Klingler

customer_reviews.title: Used it for the first time today....
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It's a great way to cook chile, soups and stews, roasts, chicken, etc. The ONLY drawback is figuring out where to store it when it's not in use. I have no other "cons" for this product. We'll see how it holds up over time. (The beef stew is delicious, by the way.)
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: high and low during same course
customer_reviews.text: \02569+ A gift for my grandson. He loved his first meal. He and I both apreciated the ability to use low and high automatically during the same cooking courese.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Hammerick

customer_reviews.title: Essential kitchen item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she loves it! Works great and the timer is its best feature. Set it and walk away. Very fast delivery and packaged well.
customer_reviews.author: Big-L-HOU

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I love the settings since we are usually at work longer in our days we cannot be home to turn off after 8 hours. this one goes to warm, I love that. just what i was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Cfree

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach Crockpot
customer_reviews.text: Love this crockpot with lock down top for easy transport. Only improvement I would recommend is for back lighting of the control panel for ease of sighting settings. The current version is difficult to read.
customer_reviews.author: gscinjeffvt

customer_reviews.title: Love this crock pot
customer_reviews.text: The heat settings are great on this crock pot. My old crock pot would burn things on warm! I am very happy with this one and love having the programmable crock pot!
customer_reviews.author: Cassie And Brad

customer_reviews.title: Easy programming double feature.
customer_reviews.text: Five pound pot roast cooked for Two hours on high then it did the Six hours on low as I had programmed. Delicious! Next time I might get a four pound roast so I can have more potatoes. Cleaning was only the lid since I used the crockpot liners.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: Love th double timer feature
customer_reviews.text: The double timer feature is the best thing about this crockpot. It is super simple to set one timer for high, the other for low, and at the end of the second timer it automatically goes to warm. We use crockpot liners to help reduce cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has used this once and it quit working it was a gift how sad poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great crockpot
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Still getting the hang of setting it up but it works fabulously.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Downs

customer_reviews.title: Great slow cooker for a good price
customer_reviews.text: This slow cooker has feature of choosing a higher temperature for a period of time and then reducing the temperature for a time which is very helpful. Easy to program and easy to clean. It’s very helpful to lock down the lid for transporting the pot as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This crock pot is great- cooks food well and is very easy to clean. I do notice that my food cooks quicker in this pot than in other crock pot brands. I love that I can set the cook time and not have to worry about it again. The crock pot also automatically switches to the warm setting once the cook time is up.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: My husband does the cooking
customer_reviews.text: My husband is the cook in the house and he asked for this product for christmas. He really loves the fact that it can be set to change the temperature during the cooking cycle. He uses this all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Evy M. Andrus

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Well, I can't say much yet as my wife hasn't used it yet but she is so glad that I got her a new one. I just hope it works well for her as she really likes it...
customer_reviews.author: Court Allen

customer_reviews.title: easy to program, clean and cook
customer_reviews.text: so far it's amazingly good, other products I used before burns food even on lower settings, the flex option let's you cook on high and later on low and vise versa for a set amount of time

customer_reviews.title: Will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, looking forward to use during holidays, thus far great slow cooker

customer_reviews.title: Very nice slow cooker
customer_reviews.text: This slow cooker is very nice. We use it quite a bit and never had any issues with it

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: At first the settings were difficult but I got it and it Cook very fast in less than and hour.

customer_reviews.title: Best kitchen item for the cook.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! My favorite thing to cook with in the kitchen. Family always borrowing it.

customer_reviews.title: Portable slow cooker
customer_reviews.text: Loved the cooker. Have used everyday. Makes delicious roast beef with potatoes noodles and carrots

customer_reviews.title: Great slow cooker
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a birthday present for my mom. She loves it because she can how cook on two different settings and it switch between the different ones automatically with the timer. Easy to clean.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: My friend gave me a crock pot like this one. I loved it so much, I bought one for my son.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This has been an amazing purchase! Love the flex cook setting and is of a great quality. Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Works good, Might over cook your food as it gets very hot on high setting.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for busy working mom

customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this Crock Pot. Definite quality. I’ve had several in past years but this is heavy duty and well made. The programming makes the cooking that much easier.

customer_reviews.title: Flexible stage cooking in a great crock pot.
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy the flexibility to heat on high for several hours then cook on low for another set amount of time. Easy to program easy to use

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing!! The programmable flex cook is a life saver for someone who works ridiculously long days and won’t be home after 10 hours or so to make sure my slow cooker isn’t on fire. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Almost unusable
customer_reviews.text: The manual has text and photos. The photos are obscure and do not illustrate the directions in the text. The readings on the cooker, which are necessary to see are invisible without a flashlight. If I hadn't tried to use it, I'd return it!
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: Great

customer_reviews.title: Dual temperature feature works well and is very useful
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected without turning itself off like a previous slow cooker that I had. Dual temperature was very useful. Only downside is that the temperature and timer display do not light up well when inputting information.

customer_reviews.text: beautiful crock pot!!! cant wait to use it! waiting for it to get cold!’😃

customer_reviews.title: Great Slow Cooker

customer_reviews.title: Easy Least Meals!!

customer_reviews.title: The flex cook mode is everything you could want!

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach Stay or Go Portable 6-Quart Programmable Slow Cooker With FlexCook Dual Digital Timer for 2 Heat Settings, Lid Lock (33861)
product_meta.description: Finally, a slow cooker that lets you program timing and heat setting to fit your schedule and your cooking style. With the Flex Cook Slow Cooker from Hamilton Beach, you can program two different heat settings and time durations in one cooking cycle, giving you greater flexibility in cooking your favorite recipes. For example, you can cook on high three hours, then low for six hours, or cook on low for four hours, then high for two. Program your slow cooker to automatically change temperature during a single cooking session3 programmable options: FlexCook mode, program mode and manual mode.
feature_bullets: 6-QUART CAPACITY Slow cooker has generous 6-quart oval crock to easily fit a 6 lb chicken or 4 lb roast seves 7+ people

Customize Your Cooking With Flexcook With This Programmable Slow Cooker Select First Heat Setting & Cooking Time Then Select Second Heat Setting & Cooking Time Automatically Shifts to Warm After Cooking No Need to Be There to Change It!
Simple Programming Select Single Temperature and Time Setting on 6-Quart Slow Cooker Automatically Shifts to Warm When Time Is up
Prefer to Keep It Simple? Select High Low or Warm in Manual Mode on the Slow Cooker Without Setting a Timer
Mess-Free Travel This 6-Quart Slow Cooker’s Stay or Go Clip-Tight Sealed Lid Prevents Spills and Leaks While Full Grip Handles Make Carrying Easy

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars758 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
